mapper.update: UPDATE publicity_message SET status = #{status}, examine_user_id = #{examinerId} WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.type, a.title, a.thumbnail, a.subtitle, a.summary, a.label, a.attachments, a.content, a.examine_user_id AS examineUserId, b.name AS examineUserName, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, c.name AS createUserName, a.status, a.send_hour AS sendHour, a.publish_time AS publishTime, a.publish_target AS publishTarget FROM publicity_message a LEFT JOIN org_user b ON a.examine_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN org_user c ON a.create_user_id = c.id WHERE a.id=#{id} AND a.is_delete = 0

SELECT a.id, a.type, a.title, a.thumbnail, a.subtitle, a.summary, a.label, a.attachments, a.examine_user_id AS examineUserId, b.name AS examineUserName, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, c.name AS createUserName, a.status, a.publish_time AS publishTime, a.publish_target AS publishTarget FROM publicity_message a LEFT JOIN org_user b ON a.examine_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN org_user c ON a.create_user_id = c.id WHERE a.`status` = 9 AND a.is_delete = 0 AND a.type = 2 AND now() > a.publish_time ORDER BY publish_time DESC LIMIT 8;
